attributes.action: To facilitate identification of police officers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A 4 digit number on the shoulders of someone (eventually taller than you are) may be not easy to see or remember. Most professionals to wear a badge or a string on the chest with their initials and surname. We wish to be complusory for a police officer to be immediately identifiable by means of a badge on the chest with name, surname, Police Authority, and grade.

rejection.details: Decisions relating to police uniforms are a matter for the Chief Constable of the force in question.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
